page.title: 20Shopping in Water
page.content: Bacup has its own shopping centre with many sorts of varied shops but Water in the North West of the block is totally different. In the past there were many shops, some selling groceries, some clothes,it even had its own Co-operative branch. Now there are only two-a general foodstore for those items people need quickly, and a newsagents. Nowadays, many residents do a large weekly shop at the nearest big supermarket which is Asda, 5 miles away in Rawtenstall. For a family of two adults and two children this weekly bill can reach Â£80.00 and could well include clothes and toys as well as food. For other items people travel to Burnley, the nearest big town, 5 miles North West.
